title: I need T206 O'Hara St. Louis Variation
author: FFIMARRIOTT

posts.post_title: I need T206 O'Hara St. Louis Variation
posts.post_content:
I am looking for a T206 Bill O'Hara (St. Louis) variation card...under $2,000, based on condition. Please send scans or clear pictures of front and back to [url]mflynn@elitevaletservices.com[/url].

Thank you,
Michael
